name: .DM File Extension
summary: Learn about .DM files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open SIS.DM and SISX.DM files with SISContents (Windows), a tool that allows you to unpack Symbian OS SIS packages. Before doing so, you must:
Open the file in a hex editor and delete its first four lines of text.
Rename the file to use the .sis or .sisx extension.

You can attempt to open other DM files in a similar manner (by deleting the files' first four lines of text, renaming them to use an appropriate extension, and opening them in an appropriate program).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
